attributes.action: To rectify the traffic problems in Aylesbury before building any more houses!!
attributes.background: Aylesbury used to be a quiet market town and has seen a considerable increase in population without the local council and government thinking about the infrastructure. Let’s hold our government and council accountable for not improving the infrustructure FIRST!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use the following pages to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
